Mini 1779Werewolves of Wildwood Grove


Moderator: SnarkySnowman

This game has been approved for Normalcy and Balance by Ether, Antihero, and Marquis.

Definition of a “Normal” game can be found by clicking here: http://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Normal_Game

Game Status: Game Over!Town Win!

Current Deadline:
None!

Game Events:
183 Golden Robster replaces golden009.
342 PantherPunt replaces choof.
987 Masquerade is lynched! Day 1 end.
988 PantherPunt, yessiree, and UpTooLate are killed! Day 2 start.
1088 Rhaegar is lynched! Day 2 end.
1089 Kelbris replaces Golden Robster.
1090 RadiantCowbells is killed! Day 3 start.
1149 Killthestory is lynched! Day 3 end.
1150 Game is over! Town win!


Those still alive1) I Am Innocent **
8) emogirl123
9) Edward Elric
10) Dierfire
11) Kelbris Golden Robster, golden009

* = prod



Those found deadMasquerade, a Werewolf, lynched Day 1.
PantherPunt choof, a Town Jailkeeper, killed Night 1.
yessiree, a Wildwood Grove Citizen, killed Night 1.
UpTooLate, a Werewolf Jack-of-all-Trades, killed Night 1.
Rhaegar, a Town Miller, lynched Day 2.
RadiantCowbells, a Town 1-shot Vigilante, killed Night 2.
Killthestory, a Serial Killer, and 1-shot Bulletproof, lynched Day 3.


For the rules without the flavor, as well as win conditions of all factions, click the spoiler below:
Spoiler: "Flavor Free Rules and Win Conditions"
1) All site-wide rules apply.

2) You may not edit posts, or post links to game content that can be edited.
3) You may not post attempting to impersonate Chancellor Snowman, in her color #0080FF
4) You may not post small or invisible text, or use ciphers or cryptograms, other languages, or anything of the sort.

5) This is a game, please have fun!
6) This is a game, please don’t be a dick to other players. No personal attacks please.
7) If you have a dispute with another player or the Chancellor, or believe something was said or done in error, please PM Chancellor Snowman or post in bold so that the Chancellor sees it.

8) “Day” phases will last 14 real-life days.
9) “Night” phases will last 2 real-life days.
10) Extensions will only be offered if replacements are needed, or in rare cases, if the game is active enough to warrant it.

11) All players must post at least once every 48 hours, or they will receive a prod. Prods must be responded to by posting in the game thread within 24 hours of receiving the prod, or Chancellor Snowman shall seek out a replacement.
12) 3 prods with no improvement to activity will result in a force-replacement, given someone is available to replace in.
13) V/LA must be noted in bold, along with the duration, to be exempt from prods (only for the duration of V/LA). This will be done at Chancellor Snowman’s discretion.

14) During the day, all players may vote for whom they would like to lynch. Votes and Unvotes must be done by using the vote tag. Bolded votes will be counted, but are highly discouraged.
15) Unvotes are appreciated, but not required to change your vote.
16) When a majority is reached, they player voted will be lynched.
17) If the deadline is reached without a majority, the player with the most votes will be lynched.
18) If multiple players have the same number of votes at deadline, the player who arrived at that number of votes first will be lynched. If the number of votes is 2 or less, a no-lynch shall occur.

19) No talking about the game outside of the game thread and relevant Private Topics.
20) Once you are dead, do not break the theme! You may not post anymore, at all.
21) Quoting Role PMs or PMs from the Mod is not allowed. However, you may paraphrase.
22) The Mod (Chancellor Snowman) reserves the right to amend or change rules as she sees fit.


Night Actions will be resolved with Natural Action Resolution.

Players may choose to use factional and individual abilities simultaneously, if possible.

This game has a role distribution of 9 Town, 2 Werewolves, and 1 Serial Killer.

Werewolves have daytalk.

All flavor in game - Votecounts, Lynches, Deaths, etc - is flavor only.

It is guaranteed that more than one person will have the following Role PM:
Vanilla Townie Role PM wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen.

You may vote during the day, and have no action at night.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated.


The Werewolf win condition is as follows:
Werewolf Win Condition wrote:You win when only the Werewolf faction remains, or nothing can prevent that from happening.


The Serial Killer win condition is as follows:
Serial Killer Win Condition wrote:You win when you make up half of the remaining players, or nothing can prevent that from happening. Your win condition trumps the Werewolf win condition.

Citizens of Wildwood Grove! You are hereby summoned to a town meeting. For those of you who do not know me, and you all should given our small numbers, I am Chancellor Snowman. Before we get down to business, there are a few rules we should remember.

1) All site-wide rules apply.

As far as posting goes, the following applies:

2) You may not edit posts, or post links to game content that can be edited.
3) You may not post attempting to impersonate Chancellor Snowman, in her color #0080FF
4) You may not post small or invisible text, or use ciphers or cryptograms, other languages, or anything of the sort.

As far as general etiquette goes, please remember the following:

5) This is a game, please have fun!
6) This is a game, please don’t be a dick to other players. No personal attacks please.
7) If you have a dispute with another player or the Chancellor, or believe something was said or done in error, please PM Chancellor Snowman or post in bold so that the Chancellor sees it.

Now, let’s get down to business. We have been a peaceful village for some time now. However, last night, in my home, I heard a bone-chilling shriek. I stared out the window of my sitting room, and saw a foul sight; by the light of the full moon, a wicked beast struck down a great man of our humble village.


Expendable Edward, a Wildwood Grove Citizen, was found dead, with his Role PM in hand. It reads:


Vanilla Town Role PM wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen.

You may vote during the day, and have no action at night.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated.



The problem is clear: On the night of the full moon, every 29 or so days, we will be attacked by Werewolves. So, keep this in mind:

8) “Day” phases will last 14 real-life days.
9) “Night” phases will last 2 real-life days.
10) Extensions will only be offered if replacements are needed, or in rare cases, if the game is active enough to warrant it.

Please, as your Chancellor, I beg of you all to remain vigilant in locating these foul beasts! We know they are among us, and require you all to be present to combat this terrible enemy.

11) All players must post at least once every 48 hours, or they will receive a prod. Prods must be responded to by posting in the game thread within 24 hours of receiving the prod, or Chancellor Snowman shall seek out a replacement.
12) 3 prods with no improvement to activity will result in a force-replacement, given someone is available to replace in.
13) V/LA must be noted in bold, along with the duration, to be exempt from prods (only for the duration of V/LA). This will be done at Chancellor Snowman’s discretion.

Now, as we are not animals, we will solve this problem in an orderly manner! After our daily tasks have been completed, we will meet here, in the center of our village, to discuss, point fingers, make conjecture, and ultimately determine our own fates, by voting and hanging the ones we think are responsible for the death of Expendable Edward.

14) During the day, all players may vote for whom they would like to lynch. Votes and Unvotes must be done by using the vote tag. Bolded votes will be counted, but are highly discouraged.
15) Unvotes are appreciated, but not required to change your vote.
16) When a majority is reached, they player voted will be lynched.
17) If the deadline is reached without a majority, the player with the most votes will be lynched.
18) If multiple players have the same number of votes at deadline, the player who arrived at that number of votes first will be lynched. If the number of votes is 2 or less, a no-lynch shall occur.

So, my fellows, let us begin! As your Chancellor, I will be in charge of tallying votes (to be edited into the top post on every page), and keeping you all in line. May god be with you all!

Other rules you should all be aware of:

19) No talking about the game outside of the game thread and relevant Private Topics.
20) Once you are dead, do not break the theme! You may not post anymore, at all.
21) Quoting Role PMs or PMs from the Mod is not allowed. However, you may paraphrase.
22) The Mod (Chancellor Snowman) reserves the right to amend or change rules as she sees fit.

Night Actions will be resolved with Natural Action Resolution.

Role distribution in this game is known to be 9 Town, 2 Werewolves, and 1 Serial Killer.

Players may choose to use factional and individual abilities simultaneously, if possible.

Werewolves have Daytalk.

All flavor in game - Votecounts, Lynches, Deaths, etc - is flavor only.

It is guaranteed that more than one person will have the same Role PM as Expendable Edward.

The Werewolf win condition is as follows:
Werewolf Win Condition wrote:You win when only the Werewolf faction remains, or nothing can prevent that from happening.


The Serial Killer win condition is as follows:
Serial Killer Win Condition wrote:You win when you make up half of the remaining players, or nothing can prevent that from happening. Your win condition trumps the Werewolf win condition.


For a flavor-free version of rules and public information in this game, see the spoiler in the bottom of the opening post.

Well, my fellows, let us begin our deliberations. As most of you have confirmed yourself to be part of our town, we shall be underway.

What are your thoughts on the setup?

Given this is a 2 KPN game, do you think we should focus efforts on hunting the wolf team or serial killer?

from the wiki wrote:If you are a Miller, there are two schools of thought about optimal play:
The first school of thought is that you should claim immediately, ideally in your opening post. This ensures that the Cop will not waste an investigation on you. It becomes more likely that you will be lynched or shot by a Vigilante, however; otherwise, it would be too easy for Mafia to fakeclaim Miller as well. This is by far the most common way to play the role on mafiascum.net.

The second school of thought is that you should not claim, but should play in such a way as to not get investigated; ideally, you would get yourself killed at Night. If investigated, however, you should expect to get lynched.

seems legit to me

My fellows, it is now the night of the full moon. As chancellor, I have tallied the votes, and because the moon is upon us, we must come to a decision.

The sun set through the trees, and the full moon began to rise. The town gathered in the center of the grove, and by torchlight, looked solemnly upon their friend Masquerade. Masquerade backed up a few steps, and bumped into Killthestory, who grabbed them by the shoulders, pushing them into the crowd. As the noose went around Masquerade's neck, some obscured faces looked away. In the torchlight, Masquerade writhed and became still, their eyes fading. As the moon began to rise, their skin became furred, and it was apparent.

Masquerade, a Werewolf, was lynched Day 1.

Alright everyone, back to your dwellings, for the night of the full moon is upon us! Keep safe, and I shall hope to see you all alive and well in the morning, when we reconvene.

It is now Night 1. Please send all actions in by Sunday, April 10th at 11pm EST.

As the sun rose in the town, the crowd gathered once again in the center of the grove. Chancellor Snowman, with a somewhat puzzled look on her face, stood up on her treestump and began.

Good morning, citizens of Wildwood Grove! I've good news for you all, and also some bad news. First things first, the bad news.

The Chancellor points towards the three figures, lying lifeless on the edge of the clearing. The crowd examined the first one closely.

PantherPunt, a Town Jailkeeper, was killed Night 1.

The second figure was badly disfigured, though upon closer inspection, it was clear to see who it was.

UpTooLate, a Werewolf Jack-of-all-Trades, was killed Night 1.

As you can tell by the three bodies, we may still have a problem with killers, despite having rid ourselves of the werewolf issue. So as always, let us begin our discussion. With 8 in our town, we require 5 votes to make a majority.

I'd like to thank you all for playing in my first modded game. Thanks to those who played, those who replaced in, and those who reviewed my setup! Here is all the info you may be wondering about.

Spoiler: "Role PMs"
Vanilla Town wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen (Vanilla Town).

You may vote during the day, and have no action at night.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated, and at least one member of the town still remains.



1-shot Vigilante wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen, and a 1-shot Vigilante.

You may vote during the day, and may choose to kill another player at night one time by sending me a PM with that player’s name. If the kill does not resolve, you have still used your shot, and become a regular Citizen.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated, and at least one member of the town still remains.



Miller wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen, and a Town Miller.

You may vote during the day, and have no actions at night. However, if you are investigated, your investigator will think you are a Werewolf.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated, and at least one member of the town still remains.



Jailkeeper wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen, and a Town Jailkeeper.

You may vote during the day, and at night you may place someone in jail by sending me a PM with that player’s name. That player will be unable to perform any night actions, and will also be immune to being killed in the night.

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated, and at least one member of the town still remains.



Seer wrote:You are a Wildwood Grove Citizen, and a Town Seer.

You may vote during the day, and at night you may use your powers to determine the alignment of one player of your choosing, by sending me a PM with that player’s name. You will then learn something of the alignment of the player you targeted, and will receive a vision (in the form of a PM from the mod) saying that "Player is a Werewolf" or "Player is not a Werewolf".

You win when all threats to Wildwood Grove have been eliminated, and at least one member of the town still remains.



Werewolf wrote:You are a Werewolf.

You may vote during the day, and may talk to your fellow Werewolf, <player>, at any time in the <private topic>. At night, you and your teammate may choose to kill one person, and which of you will perform the kill. This will be done by posting, in bold, “Kill: Player” in the private topic.

You win when only the Werewolf faction remains, or nothing can prevent that from happening.



Jack-of-all-Trades Werewolf wrote:You are a Werewolf, and Jack-of-all-Trades (Strongman, Vanilla Cop).

You may vote during the day, and may talk to your fellow Werewolf, <player>, at any time in the <private topic>. At night, you and your teammate may choose to kill one person, and which of you will perform the kill. This will be done by posting, in bold, “Kill: Player” in the private topic.

Additionally, you have the following one-shot abilities:
You may channel your strength and kill anyone through any protection or roleblocking (1-shot Strongman).
You may investigate one player to determine whether or not they are a vanilla townie. You will receive “Vanilla” or “Not Vanilla”.

You may use these abilities in the private topic in the same manner as you would perform a kill - by bolding the ability in the private topic (Investigate: Player or Strongman: Player).

You win when only the Werewolf faction remains, or nothing can prevent that from happening.



Serial Killer wrote:
You are a self-aligned Serial Killer, and 1-shot Bulletproof.

You may vote during the day, and at night you may choose a player to kill by sending me a PM with that player’s name. Additionally, you are immune to the first attempt anyone may make at your life (1-shot Bulletproof).

You win when you make up half of the remaining players, or nothing can prevent that from happening. Your win condition trumps the Werewolf win condition.
